desc: Zero waste meets convenience. With 1:1 replacements for disposables in your home, it's never been so easy to go zero waste.

layout.text: ZERO WASTE ISN'T EASY, BUT IT'S DEFINITELY WORTH IT.
Going zero waste can be hard, so I want to make it easier for you. All Stella & Sol products are designed to mimic disposables as closely as possible, without all the waste.
